wpt.name: GC2CMVB
wpt.desc: Surroundin9 the Castle - Desecrating the Throne by The Fair Maidens of Chesco, Traditional Cache (2/1)
wpt.urlname: Surroundin9 the Castle - Desecrating the Throne

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Surroundin9 the Castle - Desecrating the Throne
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: Our friend, Kin9sPank, the self proclaimed “Kin9 of Geocaching and Member of the Chester County Caching Royalty” has been claiming authority over these lands since 11/2002. After a recent VICTORY event, he posted the following log:
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
“I am declaring a moratorium on all caches less than two miles from the home coordinates. I just want to take the rest of the summer off of doing nearby caches.”
This did not sit well with the local nobility. Therefore, we are staging a COUP D’ETAT! And if you don’t think this can be done …… READ THE CROWN!
Lucky us!!! We found the THRONE!
Please obey all rules for this park.
BYOP

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Spotted it almost immediately. Found with dawnie22, 19acassel and our younger daughter.
